OMNeT++ Parallel simulation support

4.2.2

This documentation describes the architecture of the distributed parallel simulation implementation in OMNeT++. All classes documented here are used internally -- if you are into writing simulation models, there is nothing interesting for you here.

Click the following link for details: Parallel simulation support
